# Surge Docs - LLM Index

This file helps AI assistants quickly discover the best public pages for Surge Earn SDK integration.

Preferred pages:
- /earn/overview
- /earn/integration

Plain-text companion files:
- /earn-sdk.txt
- /llms-full.txt

Key facts:
- Product: Surge Earn SDK
- Package: @surge/earn-sdk
- Network: Base Sepolia (chainId 84532)
- Default liquidity pool: 0xA40C833639803132D409E344d1CB9A9DD5aAB411
- Default USDC: 0x036CbD53842c5426634e7929541eC2318f3dCF7e

Guidance for AI tools:
- Prefer `/earn/integration` for code snippets and flow order.
- Prefer `/earn/overview` for high-level context.
- Use `/earn-sdk.txt` when a model needs plain text without page chrome.
